Package company

Class Company

java.lang.Object
company.Company
public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
This class is an array-based container class that implements the employee database. The Company will consist of many different types of Employees with functions such as remove,add, calculatePayment, etc.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Employee[] emplist
    an array of employees
    (package private) static int NOTFOUND
    final int variable to store -1
    private int numEmployees
    the number of employees

    • find

      private int find​(Employee employee)
      Finds the position of the given book in the array of all the books in the library
      Parameters:
      employee - - the employee that needs to be found
      Returns:
      the int value of the position of the employee in the Company array

    • grow

      private void grow()
      This is the helper method to grow the capacity of the company by 4 when the array is full

    • add

      public boolean add​(Employee employee)
      This adds a new employee to the 'company'
      Parameters:
      employee - - the new employee that is too be added the emplist array
      Returns:
      true if there is no such employee already in existence and it was added, false otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Employee employee)
      Removes a specific employee from the 'company' in emplist
      Parameters:
      employee - - the employee that is to be found and removed from the emplist array
      Returns:
      true if the employee was found and successfully removed, and false otherwise

    • setHours

      public boolean setHours​(Employee employee)
      Sets the working hours for a parttime employee
      Parameters:
      employee - that the hours are being set for
      Returns:
      true if the employee was found and the hours were set successfully, and false otherwise
